snippet: Rafael Nadal and Andy Murray cruised into the Madrid Open quarterfinals. On the women’s side, Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova reached the semifinals.
abstract: Rafael Nadal and Andy Murray advance to Madrid Open tennis tournament quarterfinals, while Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova reach semifinals on women's side of tournament.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal and Andy Murray cruised into the Madrid Open quarterfinals. On the women’s side, Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova reached the semifinals.

headline.main: Big Names Still Alive in Madrid Open
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Big Names Still Alive in Madrid Open
